sentences.en: A postmortem was ordered to try to ascertain the cause of death.
An autopsy was needed to ascertain the cause of his death.
sentences.cn: 需验尸方能确定他的死因.

sentences.en: As a matter of fact you needn't bother to ascertain.
sentences.cn: 其实你也不必仔细看了,我已经仔细看过.

sentences.en: I'm going to ascertain the truth.
It can be difficult to ascertain the facts.
sentences.cn: 可能难以查明事实真相。

sentences.en: It has been difficult to ascertain the correct source of origin.
sentences.cn: 要查实材料的正确起源很困难.

sentences.en: It is difficult to ascertain the exact duration of protection.
sentences.cn: 要弄清确切的予防有效期并不容易.

sentences.en: It's difficult to ascertain the coal deposits.
My purpose is to ascertain whether you are interested or not.
sentences.cn: 我的目的是要弄清你是否感兴趣.

sentences.en: She felt a morbid desire to ascertain the point.
sentences.cn: 她感到有一种病态的欲望想弄明白这一点.

sentences.en: The court must therefore ascertain the " properlaw " of the contract.
sentences.cn: 因此,法院务必查明该契约的 “ 准据法 ”.

sentences.en: The police are trying to ascertain what really happened.
sentences.cn: 警方正设法查个水落石出.

sentences.en: The question is how to ascertain what the people really want.
sentences.cn: 问题在于一定要弄清人们究竟需要什么.

sentences.en: They are doing everything possible to ascertain his whereabouts.
sentences.cn: 他们正在尽力调查他的下落.

sentences.en: Through doing this, the teacher will be able to ascertain the extent to which the child understands what he is reading.
sentences.cn: 这样一来，老师就能确定孩子们对他所读的内容理解多少了。

sentences.en: We must ascertain the responsibility in light of different situations.
sentences.cn: 我们必须根据不同情况判定责任.

trans.tran_cn: 弄清， 查明； 确定
